ing: 2 cups light beer (such as Bud LightÂ®)
2 tablespoons lemon juice, or to taste
des: "A very robust, lite, and crispy batter that compliments fish, pork, and chicken as well as broccoli, cauliflower, or zucchini. This beer batter will explode with flavor once it hits your mouth, and thirds will be in order when serving things battered and fried with this goodness."
ins: Beat flour, cornmeal, lemon pepper, garlic powder, black pepper, oregano, cayenne pepper, cumin, paprika, thyme, onion powder, and both types of light beer together in a large mixing bowl with a whisk until smooth with the consistency of beer batter; add lemon juice.
